alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 10:36PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN MORTON AND SOUTHWESTERN STANTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM CDT... At 1036 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near The Saunders Elevator to 6 miles southeast of Boise City. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... The Saunders Elevator around 1040 PM CDT. Manter around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Johnson City and Richfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
